pages.text: Bedrock dust is a powerful material for some accessories and weapons, even allowing you to craft bedrock with enough of it.$(br2)It can only be obtained after defeating the $(l:terramity:bosses/trial_guardian)Trial Guardian$() and obtaining a perish staff.
The $(l:terramity:bosses/trial_guardian)Trial Guardian$() drops a perish staff when defeated, a necessary item to progress. Using the perish staff on bedrock will decay it, allowing it to be mined.
